description: Engineers at UC Santa Barbara have developed a revolutionary display that allows users to physically feel digital images in real time. The system uses optotactile pixels that expand when struck by light, forming raised bumps that match visual content. This wire-free design relies on heat-activated air pockets, opening new possibilities for interactive screens in smartphones, vehicles, virtual reality, and smart architectural surfaces where touch and vision seamlessly merge.
title: Scientists Unveil Screen That Produces Touchable 3D Images Using Light-Activated Pixels

description: SpaceX has launched 29 Starlink satellites into low Earth orbit from California, expanding its broadband constellation to more than 9,100 active spacecraft. The reusable Falcon 9 booster completed its 12th mission with a successful ocean landing, highlighting SpaceX’s push toward rapid, low-cost, global internet coverage.
title: SpaceX Expands Starlink Network With 29-Satellite Falcon 9 Launch

description: Francis Lawrence’s The Long Walk is a tense, slow-burning Stephen King adaptation. The film follows teenagers competing in a high-stakes walking contest. Available now on PVOD platforms like Prime Video and Apple TV, it offers suspense, psychological drama, and intense storytelling for at-home viewing.
title: Francis Lawrence’s The Long Walk (2025) Now Available for Rent on Prime Video and Apple TV

description: Hell’s Paradise Season 2 arrives on Crunchyroll in January 2026 with intense action, powerful character moments, and stunning visuals. The season adapts two major arcs from the manga, expanding the story’s depth and danger. With an IMDb rating of 8.1/10, the series remains one of anime’s most anticipated returns.
title: Hell’s Paradise Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: NASA has successfully completed the full assembly of the Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope, marking a major milestone for the next-generation infrared observatory. With its powerful wide-field camera and advanced coronagraph, Roman is expected to transform our understanding of dark energy, galaxy formation, and exoplanets once it launches later this decade.
title: Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope Fully Assembled, Launch Planned for 2026–2027

description: Srabanti Chatterjee shines as Devi Chowdhurani in this Bengali period drama. The film is set to stream on ZEE5 and OTTplay Premium from December 12, 2025, following its theatrical success, bringing Bengal’s first woman freedom fighter to the digital audience. IMDb rating stands at 5.0/10.
title: Devi Chowdhurani OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Srabanti Chatterjee’s Period Drama Online?

description: Grand Theft Auto 6 (GTA 6) will be released on November 19, 2026, Rockstar Games recently announced. This came after the release of the much-anticipated open-world crime game was already delayed once to May next year. While gamers wait for its release, the game developer has been releasing teasers for it, hinting at its storyline, characters, and other open-world elements. It is expected to be initially available on Sony's PlayStation 5 and Microsoft's Xbox Series S and X consoles.
title: GTA 6 Roundup: Know About the Launch Date, Price in India, System Requirements and More

description: Web browsers store information such as websites you access, files you download, and searches. These raise privacy concerns, especially when you are using shared and public devices. This article explains how to delete your browsing history and gives you step-by-step ways to clear all or part of it.
title: How to Delete History on Google Chrome, Firefox, Other Browsers: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Spider-Noir is a live-action series featuring Nicolas as Peter Parker, a private investigator set in the 1930s of New York, a depressed city, and he, along with his heroic past, is the only hope to save the city.
title: Nicolas Cage Starrer Spider-Noir Set to Release on Prime Video in 2026

description: The OnePlus Pad Go 2 is all set to be launched in India on December 17. On paper, it promises meaningful upgrades over the first-generation Pad Go. The tablet comes in two colourways and sports a sports a 12.1-inch 2.8K screen. It is claimed to be the first OnePlus tablet to support 5G connectivity, along with the new Stylo. There are still things we need to evaluate closely, though, including performance, camera, battery life and software experience. Stay tuned for our full review.
title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 First Impressions

description: Elon Musk says xAI will release Grok 4.20 within three to four weeks, marking one of the company’s fastest model updates. The unreleased version has reportedly been tested on the Alpha Arena platform, where it outperformed models like GPT-5.1 and Gemini 3 Pro by delivering a 12 percent profit in a stock-trading simulation. The update is expected to bring stronger reasoning and faster real-world data processing.
title: Elon Musk Says Grok 4.20 AI Model Could Be Released in a Month

description: OnePlus Pad Go 2 will launch on December 17 and go on sale on December 18 as the successor to the 2023 OnePlus Pad Go. Aimed at students and young professionals, it will be powered by the 4nm MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra chipset and is expected to offer TÜV-certified smooth performance. It will pack a 10,050mAh battery with 33W fast charging, support a new stylus, feature a 12.1-inch Dolby Vision display, and likely run Android 16-based OxygenOS 16.
title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 Key Specifications and Sale Date Revealed; Will Feature Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC

description: OpenAI has published its first report on enterprise AI adoption, saying more than one million business customers now use its tools. Surveying 9,000 workers, the company found sharp growth in ChatGPT Enterprise usage, including an eight-fold rise in weekly messages and a major jump in complex reasoning tasks. Most respondents said AI improved speed or quality of work. The report arrives as CEO Sam Altman reportedly pushes to refocus efforts on strengthening ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Claims Increased Enterprise Usage Amid CEO’s Code Red Declaration

description: Samsung's One UI 8.5 beta is currently available to the Galaxy S25 series. The update is currently available in select countries like Korea, the US, the UK, Germany, India, and Poland. It brings a new customisable Quick Panel and improved Galaxy AI tools. The update is said to include the December 2025 Android security patch. The update is around 4GB.
title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 Beta Update Rolls Out to Galaxy S25 Series in Multiple Regions

description: UCO Bank allows customers to check their account balance easily using several online methods. These include net banking, mobile banking apps like UCO mBanking+ and UCO mPassbook, UPI apps, WhatsApp banking, SMS, and a missed call service. Each option is designed to offer quick, secure, and round-the-clock access to balance details. Customers can choose the method that suits them best, whether they use smartphones, basic phones, or computers, without needing to visit a bank branch.
title: UCO Bank Balance Check Number: How to Check UCO Balance Online Using Different Methods

description: Bharti Airtel has reportedly partnered with Google to roll out RCS messaging on its network. According to a report, Airtel will soon offer RCS using Google’s platform and has agreed to a revenue-sharing model. Under this deal, Airtel will charge Rs. 0.11 per RCS message, with an 80:20 revenue share agreement between Airtel and Google.
title: Airtel Reportedly Partners With Google to Launch RCS Messaging for Users in India

description: Bitcoin hovered near $91,300 (roughly Rs. 82.3 lakh) on Monday as traders maintained a defensive stance ahead of the US Federal Reserve’s policy decision. Altcoins slipped mildly while analysts cited persistent ETF outflows, cooler demand, and defensive derivatives positioning. Market sentiment remains uncertain, though leverage resets and expectations of a rate cut could set the stage for sharper moves later in the week.
title: Bitcoin Steadies Around $91,300 as Crypto Market Sentiment Remains Cautious

description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) has issued an advisory regarding multiple vulnerabilities affecting two popular Chromium-based web browsers — Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge. The latest bulletin, published on Monday, has flagged the discovered vulnerabilities as high risk that could potentially allow threat actors to exploit the security flaws and remotely execute arbitrary code on the affected systems.
title: CERT-In Warns Chrome, Edge Users of ‘High’ Risk Vulnerabilities on Windows, macOS, and Linux

description: Coinbase has reopened user sign-ups in India after almost two years, confirming its return during India Blockchain Week 2025. The exchange said Indian users can once again register and trade crypto, and it plans to introduce a fiat on-ramp in 2026. Coinbase had previously paused operations due to UPI restrictions and compliance issues. Its renewed efforts follow FIU registration earlier this year, signalling a long-term commitment to the Indian market.
title: Coinbase Reopens Registrations in India, Plans Fiat On-Ramp in 2026

description: Google is reportedly preparing to launch Nano Banana 2 Flash, a new version of its fast, low-cost image generation model. Code references found in the Gemini app suggest the model is nearing rollout, with tipsters claiming early access. Like its predecessor, it is expected to prioritise speed over fine detail and may reach free-tier users. Early samples indicate only a modest quality gap compared to the Pro version.
title: Google Could Soon Release Nano Banana 2 Flash AI Model: Report

description: Boost productivity when you unlock Adobe Acrobat features that are free to use for all: comment, annotate, highlight, sign, and more.
title: How to Get the Most Out of Adobe Acrobat's Free Online PDF Editor

description: Infinix Note 60 series could launch soon. Ahead of any official announcement from the Transsion Holding subsidiary, the Infinix Note 60, Note 60 Edge, and Note 60 Pro surfaced on Indonesia's SDPPI certification site, pretty much confirming their arrival. Meanwhile, the Infinix Note 60 Pro has surfaced on the Geekbench website with model number X6878.
title: Infinix Note 60, Note 60 Edge, Note 60 Pro Reportedly Spotted on SDPPI Certification Site; Specifications Revealed on Geekbench

description: The DC fans can cheer up, as their favourite Superman, along with his Kryptonian heritage, is coming on to the Jio Hotstar, as teased by the platform, to release on December 11th, 2025.
title: James Gunn's Superman to Release on JioHotstar on December 11: What You Need to Know

description: Jolla has opened pre-orders for the Jolla Phone, a privacy-focused Linux smartphone, with a refundable EUR 99 (roughly Rs. 10,400) down payment and a full price of EUR 499 (roughly Rs. 52,400). Sales are planned for the EU, UK, Norway, and Switzerland, with delivery expected by mid-2026. The phone features a 6.36-inch AMOLED display, an unspecified MediaTek 5G chipset, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, Sailfish OS 5, a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup, and a user-replaceable 5,500mAh battery.
title: Jolla Phone Launched With 5,500mAh Replaceable Battery, Linux-Based Sailfish OS 5: Price, Availability, Features

description: Meta has acquired AI wearables startup Limitless, known for its Pendant device that continuously records audio to help users retrieve information. CEO Dan Siroker said the deal will help scale the technology and accelerate product development while aligning with Meta’s vision for “personal superintelligence.” Limitless will stop selling new Pendants but will support existing users for a year and upgrade them to the Unlimited Plan at no extra cost.
title: Meta Acquires AI Wearables Startup Limitless, Could Expand Its Hardware Offerings

description: British smartphone brand Nothing announced the rollout of its latest Android 16-based firmware — dubbed Nothing OS 4.0 — in November, and some of its models have recently begun receiving the update in recent weeks. The company, however, is reported to have encountered an issue and has now reportedly paused its rollout to implement an “urgent fix”. Users who have already received the Nothing OS 4.0 update are expected to receive a patched version once it is rolled out.
title: Nothing OS 4.0 Update Rollout Reportedly Paused to Implement ‘Urgent’ Fix

description: OnePlus 15R India launch is only a few days away. The Chinese tech firm has been teasing the key specifications, features, and design of the upcoming smartphone. Set to be the second phone in the lineup, it is teased to be equipped with a dual rear camera unit and a 7,400mAh battery. Moreover, the smartphone brand has announced that it will be powered by Qualcomm’s new octa core Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, which was launched by the chip maker in November.
title: OnePlus 15R Roundup: Know About the Launch Date, Price in India, Design, and Specifications

description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has reportedly declared a “code red,” telling employees to pause all non-ChatGPT projects as the company responds to Google’s stronger-than-expected Gemini 3 launch. Altman is said to be prioritising rapid improvements to ChatGPT, even slowing ad and revenue experiments. Reports suggest GPT-5.2 may arrive imminently to close the performance gap, while updates to products like Sora and Atlas could be delayed.
title: OpenAI's Code Red: 5 Things to Know About the AI Giant’s ChatGPT Strategy

description: Oppo Find X9 Velvet Red colour variant is now available in India exclusively in the 12GB + 256GB configuration at Rs. 74,999. With bank and exchange offers, the effective price drops to Rs. 67,499. The new shade joins the Titanium Grey and Space Black options. The phone features a 6.59-inch 120Hz AMOLED display, Dimensity 9500 chipset, a 7,025mAh battery with fast charging, and a 50-megapixel Hasselblad-backed camera setup.
title: Oppo Find X9 Velvet Red Colourway Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers, Features

description: Samsung has reportedly delayed its Ballie home robot once again, suggesting it will not launch in 2025 as previously promised. The South Korean tech giant reportedly said it is still refining the technology for a better user experience. Ballie was last expected to launch in summer 2025 in the US and South Korea, but missed that window. First revealed in 2020, the AI robot may now reappear at CES 2026.
title: Samsung Ballie Robot Reportedly Delayed Again, Won't Launch This Year

description: The iconic Sierra makes a comeback after decades, combining its nostalgic charm with modern SUV design and premium features for an enhanced driving experience.
title: Sierra First Impressions: Tata’s Icon Returns in Style

description: The Boys Season 5 is the explosive final season of the global hit series. With Homelander ruling unchecked and the Boys fighting to survive, the story promises high drama, brutal action, and a powerful end. Streaming April 8, 2026, on Prime Video.
title: The Boys Season 5 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch the Final Season Online?

description: The Strangers Chapter 2 continues the story from Season 1 with Maya's struggle to survive and the Strangers' hunt to kill her.
title: The Strangers Chapter 2 Now Available on Rent on Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, and More

description: Xiaomi 17 series, which included the vanilla Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max, was launched in China on September 25. Now, the smartphone maker appears to be preparing for the global launch of at least the standard model, as a tipster has spotted the smartphone on the Geekbench benchmarking platform with the model number 25113PN0EG. The handset appeared on Geekbench with the same Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC as its Chinese counterpart. Moreover, it could ship in the global markets with Android 16.
title: Xiaomi 17 Global Variant Listed on Geekbench, Tipped to Launch in India by February 2026

description: Motorola Edge 70 will be launched by the smartphone maker in India in the third week of December. The handset will be sold in the country in three colourways via Flipkart, the Motorola India online store, and other offline retail stores. Apart from this, the tech firm has also revealed that the Motorola Edge 70 will be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, housed inside a 5.99mm thick body. It is teased to feature a metal frame, too. The handset will be equipped with a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, paired with an LED flash.
title: Motorola Edge 70 India Launch Date Announced; Confirmed to Feature Triple 50-Megapixel Camera Setup

description: Battlefield 6 is set to get its next Season 1 update this week, bringing new content, audio improvements, and a host of fixes. The new content will be part of the Winter Offensive update, which includes a new limited-time mode, a limited-time map modification, and a new weapon. Update 1.1.3.0 also adds a host of audio improvements and fixes.
title: Battlefield 6's 'Winter Offensive' Update Launches This Week With New Content, Audio Improvements and More

description: Chinese smartphone makers are said to be aiming to capitalise on Apple’s continued delay in rolling out artificial intelligence (AI) features by luring iPhone users to switch to their devices. According to a report, China-based original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) such as Honor, Huawei, Oppo, Vivo, and Xiaomi have begun promoting apps that help users switch from iOS to their devices, or use an iPhone alongside Chinese smartphones.
title: Chinese Brands Aiming to Win Users with AI Features That Apple Lacks: Report

description: Vivo S50 series launch date has been announced by the company. The upcoming Vivo S50 Pro Mini is confirmed to launch in Confession, Inspiration Purple and Space Gray (translated from Chinese) colour options. The standard Vivo S50 will be available in Confession, Inspiration Purple, Serene Blue, and Space Gray finishes. The Vivo S50 Pro Mini will run on a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset and feature a 6.31-inch flat display.
title: Vivo S50, Vivo S50 Pro Mini Launch Date Announced; Colour Options Revealed

description: Starlink, the satellite internet provider, has revealed the monthly residential subscription price in India. The wholly-owned subsidiary of the Elon Musk-led SpaceX, Starlink, claims that the subscription fee will include the cost of the hardware, including the satellite receiver, ground wires, and terminals. This comes shortly after the parent company, SpaceX, listed multiple job postings in India for Starlink’s Bengaluru office. The tech firm has been planning an expansion in the country, too, by establishing its gateway earth stations in a number of locations across India. The company reportedly received a five-year license to operate in the country earlier this year.
title: Starlink Subscription Price in India Revealed as Elon Musk-Led Firm Prepares for Imminent Launch

description: Google has released its Gemini 3 Deep Think model to users on the AI Ultra tier, offering major gains in reasoning, logic and problem-solving. The model has drawn attention for high benchmark scores on Humanity’s Last Exam and ARC-AGI-2. Google says Deep Think uses “parallel reasoning” to explore multiple solution paths at once. It is currently limited to Ultra subscribers paying Rs. 24,500 per month.
title: Google Releases Gemini 3 Deep Think Model to Its Most Expensive Subscription Tier

description: Meta has reportedly postponed the launch of its Phoenix mixed-reality glasses to 2027, pushing it back from the originally planned second half of 2026. The delay was reportedly confirmed by Maher Saba, VP of Reality Labs Foundation, in an internal memo. Meta is also reportedly working on a 'limited edition' wearable device, codenamed Malibu 2, to launch in 2026. The company has also started early development of its next-generation Quest headset.
title: Meta’s Phoenix Mixed Reality Smart Glasses Reportedly Delayed; Could Finally Launch in 2027

description: Apple launched the iPhone 16 in India at Rs. 79,900 in September 2024. It is now available at an effective price of Rs. 65,900 for the 128GB variant through Imagine, after a Rs. 4,000 cashback on SBI, ICICI Bank, and IDFC First Bank cards. The phone is also available on a no-cost EMI of about Rs. 10,983 per month. The 256GB and 512GB models are priced at Rs. 79,900 and Rs. 99,900, respectively, via the same reseller.
title: iPhone 16 Deal Alert: Get It for Just Rs 65,900 Effective Price

description: OpenAI officials have dismissed claims of ads appearing on paid tiers of ChatGPT. The controversy initially stemmed from screenshots shared by users on social media recently, highlighting ads appearing below prompt responses in an unrelated conversation. This happened even if they were enrolled in a paid subscription to the AI chatbot. Following the backlash, an OpenAI official claimed that what users saw on social media was either “not ads or not real”.
title: OpenAI Clarifies It Isn’t Testing Ads on ChatGPT Despite User Claims

description: The Realme Narzo 80 Series 5G was launched in India in April this year, and its successor could be on the cards. According to a teaser shared by an e-commerce platform, the Realme Narzo 90 Series 5G will be launched in India soon. The teaser image reveals that two models are in line for debut, and both may sport different designs. While details remain under wraps, reports suggest the upcoming models could be the Realme Narzo 90 Pro 5G and Realme Narzo 90x 5G.
title: Realme Narzo 90 Series 5G India Launch Announced; to Go on Sale via Amazon

description: Xiaomi India COO Sudhin Mathur, in an exclusive chat with Gadgets 360, discussed how the next Redmi Note is designed to win back loyalists. Xiaomi India is likely to launch the Redmi Note early in 2026 with multiple products in the line-up. Xiaomi India COO Mathur also talked about the IoT category push in 2026.
title: Xiaomi's Sudhin Mathur Talks About Next Redmi Note Smartphone, AI, IoT Push, and 2026 Roadmap
